@elpirate8:

There are a few options you have:
1. You need VLC!
2. Update your codecs to the latest version.
Google for and download the Shark codec pack. If you have a 64 bit Windows be sure to download the 64 bit version additionally! Install both, fist 32 bit version, then 64 bit version.
Now even media player should be able to play the files.
3. Your files are simply corrupted, try redownloading the torrent and files.
